mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, URL , CASE TARGET WHEN 1 THEN '_blank' WHEN 2 THEN '_self' WHEN 3 THEN '_parent' WHEN 4 THEN '_top' ELSE '_self' END AS TARGET , (SELECT URL_PATH FROM FF_ATTACH_FILE_DETAIL WHERE FILE_ID = B.ATTACH1_FILE ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS IMG_URL FROM CB_BANNER B WHERE POSITION = #{position} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
